questions.question: How many volumes can be created at a time using the PowerStore Manager?
What are two properties of the VMware file system which are supported by PowerStore? (Choose two.)
answers: Supports VAAI primitives
Available with NFS datastores
Supports quotas
Available with VMFS datastores

questions.question: The wan connection between the production and DR sites has a low latency of <5 milliseconds.
What is the maximum number of supported replication and snapshot rules in a protection policy?
answers: One snapshot rule and four replication rules
One snapshot rule and one replication rule
Four snapshot rules and one replication rule
Four snapshot rules and four replication rules

questions.question: At what point in the configuration of an External Storage import session does the data path from the host to the PowerStore system become the active I/O path?
answers: When the import session begins
As MPIO restarts on the host
Before launching the Import Storage wizard
During the ImportKit installation

questions.question: Which statement about File Mobility Network configuration is correct?
answers: File mobility network is created on the same subnet and VLAN as the management network
File mobility network is created with an optional Cluster IP
File mobility network is created on the same subnet and VLAN as the storage network
File mobility network is created under the management tab in PowerStore Manager

questions.question: What are two minimum requirements for using VMware Site Recovery Manager (SRM) with PowerStore? (Choose two.)
answers: VMware SRM version 8.3 and newer
VMware SRM version 8.0 and newer
VMware vCenter Server and ESXi hosts version 6.5 and newer
VMware vCenter Server and ESXi hosts version 6.7 and newer

questions.question: Which drive configuration is available for the PowerStore ENS24 Expansion Enclosure?
answers: NVMe NVRAM
NVMe SSD
SAS SSD
NVMe SCM

questions.question: Which two operations does the PowerStore NAS VAAI plug-in support? (Choose two.)
answers: Space Reclaim
Quota Exceeded Behavior
Reserve space
Atomic Test and Set
Extended Statistics

questions.question: Refer to the exhibit. Which SMB path is used to access the share from client side?
answers: \\SMB-FS07\Sales\Hmarine_Sales
\\nas-smb07.hmarine test\SMB-FS07\ Hmarine_Sales
\\SMB-FS07\Hmarine_Sales
\\nas-smb07.hmarine.test\ Hmarine_Sales

questions.question: While trying to add iSCSI hosts to a host group, some of the hosts are not showing up within the Add Host Group list. What is causing this?
answers: Missing hosts have mapped volumes
iSCSI CHAP is disabled
Storage network is not configured
Missing hosts are marked for iSCSI and FC

questions.question: An administrator is attempting to create a protection policy while creating an SMB share however the option is not available. What is the reason?
answers: The protection policy has been previously associated with a file system
The protection policy must be created before associating it with the volume resource
The protection policy must be created before associating it with the file system
The protection policy is only available with file level retention enabled

questions.question: Which requirement of a source storage system is invalid when participating in PowerStore Native Import migration?
answers: With iSCSI connectivity between source and PowerStore, Global storage IP address is not required
Administrator privileges are required on the source and associated hosts to import to a PowerStore cluster
For EqualLogic, the front-end connectivity must be iSCSI
For PowerMax or VMAX, the front-end connectivity must be FC

questions.question: A storage administrator is configuring an import session from a VNX2 for Windows host data. The administrator inputs the SPA IP address into the Add Remote System configuration. The administrator then checks the Verify Alternate Address option for the User Authentication configuration. What does this action provide?
answers: Selects the PowerStore Global Storage Discovery IP
Generates a duplicate of the SPA RSA key for the SPB HTTPS certificate
Validates the SPB IP address and certificate for high availability

questions.question: Which of me following is true statement?
answers: End-to-end NVMe-oF is supported with TCP only
PowerStore 500 is NEBS-compliant
PowerStore 500 is not NEBS-compliant
End-to-end NVMe-oF is supported with FC only

questions.question: A customer has a new PowerStore T system that has been running for 45 days with multiple host systems attached. A user with the storage administrator role attempts to create a volume for a host, but the option is unavailable. What is the cause?
answers: Appliance has reached the 90% full threshold
The host is incorrectly zoned
Permanent license has not been applied
Incorrect privileges are assigned
